result.html: tharla sé gan choinneIt happened unexpectedly.
result.ponchtml: ṫarla sé gan ċoinneIt happened unexpectedly.

result.ga: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinne

result.html: fuair sé bás tobann gan choinneHe died suddenly and unexpectedly.

result.eng: The building collapsed unexpectedly in late afternoon that day.
